about_the_game:
Upgrade your arsenal with a stunning new look in Strayed! The Oil Slick Blue skin pack brings a unique, iridescent finish to your weapons, making each piece glisten with metallic shades of blue and green that shift in the light. This skin pack is perfect for players who want to survive on the islands in style!

Purchasing this multi-weapon skin pack allows for the Oil Slick Blue skin to be applied to all of the following weapons:

- M16

- AK

- F8

- SMG

- BOLT ACTION SHOTGUN

- MILITARY PISTOL

- M1 GARAND
